unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!

unnormalised: Hey students! Ditch the chai stall gossip and listen up! Finding scholarships can be tougher than cracking the IIT-JEE, but not anymore! A whole bunch of scholarship portals are popping up, making it easier than ever to fund your dreams.
normalised: Hey students! Ditch the chai stall gossip and listen up! Finding scholarships can be tougher than cracking the I I T-J E E, but not anymore! A whole bunch of scholarship portals are popping up, making it easier than ever to fund your dreams.

unnormalised: Think of them as online matchmaking services, but for your brain and a benefactor’s wallet. Whether you're eyeing BITS Pilani or a local college in Patna, these portals list everything from merit-based grants to schemes for specific communities, like support for girl students from rural UP.
normalised: Think of them as online matchmaking services, but for your brain and a benefactor’s wallet. Whether you're eyeing B I T S Pilani or a local college in Patna, these portals list everything from merit-based grants to schemes for specific communities, like support for girl students from rural U P.

unnormalised: One popular portal, "Vidya Dhan," claims to have helped students bag over Rs. 5 Crore in scholarships just last year! Deadlines are creeping up, with many closing around 30/06/2024. So, register ASAP! A friend, Priya Sharma, even landed a fully funded trip to Germany thanks to one!
normalised: One popular portal, "Vidya Dhan," claims to have helped students bag over rupee five crore in scholarships just last year! Deadlines are creeping up, with many closing around thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four. So, register A S A P! A friend, Priya Sharma, even landed a fully funded trip to Germany thanks to one!

unnormalised: Remember to have all your documents ready – Aadhaar, 10th & 12th mark sheets, the works! And check back often, because new scholarships get listed all the time, sometimes even at 14:00 hrs sharp! Happy scholarship hunting, and remember, knowledge is power (and sometimes, free!). Don't miss that deadline at 23:59 hrs!
normalised: Remember to have all your documents ready – Aadhaar, tenth and twelfth mark sheets, the works! And check back often, because new scholarships get listed all the time, sometimes even at fourteen hundred hours sharp! Happy scholarship hunting, and remember, knowledge is power (and sometimes, free!). Don't miss that deadline at twenty three fifty nine hours!
